simple.name: Conservative Average
simple.description: Uses the average and standard deviation from the last 20 weeks to determine what the demand will be next week.  One standard deviation is added to the average to handle any increase in demand.

linearRegression.name: Linear Regression
linearRegression.description: Uses the least squares method to build a simple linear regression model, which is used to predict future demand using the calculated trend from the last 20 weeks.
